name: heatbag
text: Some things you are just supposed to think, not say.

name: macdaddyw
text: Those are usually the things that are hardest NOT to say. Then you slip and end up like Beef in panel 11 thinking "FUCK, did I just say that?"

name: deusoma
text:
When I'm with friends, I like to wait for lulls in the conversation and then go "Oh fuck, did I say that out loud?!"
After they say no, I respond "Oh thank God ! You guys would have killed me!"

name: missbee
text:
Man whycome none of my friends are as fun-sounding as half of assetbar posters?

This...I really want to try this.

name: dasilodavi
text: You have decent enough friends it seems.  Mine wouldn't lie to me.  They would be all, "Yes, you totally said it, what are you, some kind of an idiot?"

name: woodenteeth
text: I would have to disaggree. Beef just lacks conviction. I'm a dude who's been to a few gyms. Gym dudes WANT to hear this kinda thing. Even if it is a little gauche. You ask 'em what reps etc. they do to get there and you watch them go off on a rant. Beef don't belong 'cause he don't have the stranger-to-stranger sass.

name: dougthehead
text: Leo's reaction in the next strip seems to refute your thesis.

name: woodenteeth
text: yes. i read through the arc the next day. i would make a claim that my thoughts were more applicable to real life than comic cats but that would be kinda pointless. I was wrong.

name: mattylite
text: Whoa, those last three words.  Chubbied for those last three words.  Not often seen on these boards, in that order.

name: woodenteeth
text: "Was I wrong?" would be an order far more ambiguous and far more dickishly forum like.

name: stereo
text:
It reminds me of a palindrome I once heard, anyway. And for that it can't be too bad.

To wit: I madam, I made radio. So I dared, am I mad? am I?

I'd like to cite this to Spider Robinson, speaking as Nikola Tesla, in Callahan's Legacy , but I don't know my formatting. Worth a read.

name: selbencoirlo
text: Palindrome chubby!

name: terribleman
text: Totally

name: vulpes-aurum
text: race car.

name: elzilcho
text: snuggleguns

name: mattylite
text: Wait, somethin' don't seem right...

name: tragicone
text: no, you were right. I go to the gym. I would love to be asked how i got to where I did.

name: woodenteeth
text: Red, striated, with no waist or chest and cycloptic vision?

name: tragicone
text: yeh, but look at dem thighs!

name: gamemeister27
text: Especially at gyms. There was this guy benching over 300 pounds, and he was roaring like a lion for some reason. I nearly died trying not to laugh at the ridiculous muscle man.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesler729, tttt2, michellemarie)

name: epicurus
text: I love this strip so much. The way Beef does not belong there, and all it takes is a short while before he reveals that he cannot breathe the atmosphere in the gym. If it were not the thighs comment it would have been something else.

name: dovey
text: Is this the strip with the most awkward pause panels?

name: terribleman
text: Noone has called you wrong in two years, so I'm guessing you are on to something.

name: morganization
text: i laughed for a long time over this one

name: billyamericana
text: Behold the lower lip of Ray's Shame. It will HAUNT YOUR DREAMS, child.

name: agika
text: Oops.

name: deimosrising
text: Note the silhouette behind Leo in panel 5. Remind you of anyone?

name: dropkickpikachu
text: My mind. It is blown.

name: daklin
text: Yeah no question that's Showbiz. I wonder if the speaker company is still on his ass.

name: alphagator
text: not showbiz, but Mantonio from the Mile-High Club arc

name: twoheadedboy
text: Yeah I was just reading these comments to see who else noticed the Showbiz shadow there. That's one of the stranger things I've seen in Achewood.

name: zem
text: brochicho

name: nurdbot
text: Man, that drive home must have been hella awkward. Ray furious while poor old Beef tryin' to figuire out what he messed up.

name: william
text: Alt Text: Beef doesn't know the code at that place. He has committed a Dudes' Mutiny.

name: i_love_kate
text: Mutiny?

name: deusoma
text: I also question the use of the word in these circumstances.

name: i_love_kate
text: Anderian, cailetshadow, your actions have been noted and news of them will be slipped underhanded to the angel who decides your worthiness on the Day of Judgment.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: maybe it is said 'cos it is in a similar vein of conversation which could possibly be something a lady would say to another one, opening opportunity for other ladies to chime in with compliments while the original commenter fades into the background.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
dang. commenters fading into the background is hell of a good concept for messageboards as thus.

yeeeah.

name: centipede_damascus
text: It could have been a thing but Roast Beef just don't got no sense of etiquette.

name: deancain29
text: why is there a shadow of Showbiz in panel 5?

name: phoenixultima
text: Rockford-Fosgate won't pay itself off, dude.

name: deimosrising
text: Why is there a shadow of my post 5 posts below my post

name: riazm
text: I took up golf so that I could make small talk like this.

name: dasilodavi
text: A comment left by dasilodavi was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, mjfitzge, re5urgam, gbeaton, slalvation)

name: jaminspoon
text: [quote="Ray Romano"]No I just mean.. I just mean you have rockin' thighs. That's what I mean. I mean. No. What did you think I meant?[/quote]

name: jaminspoon
text: oh god that didnt work at all OH GOD

name: jaminspoon
text: [quote=Ray Romano]No I just mean.. I just mean you have rockin' thighs. That's what I mean. I mean. No. What did you think I meant?[/quote]

name: jaminspoon
text: THAT WORKED EVEN LESS THAN THE FIRST ONE WHICH WAS ALREADY WORKING NOT AT ALL OH JESUS

name: jaminspoon
text:
Might as well perform a bbcode test. This is the best place for it afterall, as can be clearly noted.

this text is bold
this text is italic
this text is underlined
[color=blue]this text is blue[/color]
[size= 2]this text is two sizes larger than normal[/size]
[font=courier]this text is in the courier font[/font]
[highlight]this text is highlighted[/highlight]
[left]this text is left-aligned[/left]
[center]this text is center-aligned[/center]
[right]this text is right-aligned[/right] 
this text is indented

[list]
[*]list item 1
[*]list item 2
[/list]
AdvancedList
[list=1]
[*]list item 1
[*]list item 2
[/list]
[list=a]
[*]list item 1
[*]list item 2
[/list]
[code]

[/code]
[php]
$myvar = 'Hello World!';
for ($i = 0; $i < 10; $i )
{
echo $myvar . "\n";
}
[/php]
[html]

Testing
[/html]
Quotes =(
Quote:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet

[quote=John Doe]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet[/quote]
[quote=John Doe;9154229]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet[/quote]
[ot]I am discussing something off-topic[/ot]
Line?
[rule=60%]Navy[/rule]
[line=60%]Navy[/line]
[small]This is small text[/small]
[spoiler]This text will be hidden[/spoiler]
[youtube]no way this would work, Onstad why would you[/youtube]

name: jaminspoon
text:
what a peculiar turn of events

several BBCodes appear to not be relevant to this forum

that is a trueshame and yet vastly preferable to a forum filled with shitposts


I think we've all learned something here today.

name: henrythecad
text: I feel sorry for beef. A man was misplaced, and in the end, things were said.

name: doomsdaybadger
text: This is, and whill always be my favorite achewood strip.

name: tagrineth
text: People from Circumstances don't know the best etiquette...

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, ButterMoths, silver_lake, invidious, the_doz, hellofditties, scraggg, Doc_Rostov, aparrish)

name: soticoto
text:
Ooooh... I see it now.

... Showbiz is working behind the screen. ^_^

name: baryonyx
text: The out-of-speech-bubble laughter just doesn't do it for me. It's like laughter is resonating from their skulls as they converse.

name: norsef
text: I think its a hollow polite laugh. It happens all the time when two people who don't really know each other meet and make jokes.

name: charchar
text: Anybody else desirous of a tank top with an insect diagram?

name: mattylite
text:
Me.
(I am)

name: deus
text: Do's and dont's

name: thegreatestcape
text:
Leo's thighs are very much the elephant(s) in the room.

Yes they are rockin'; that much is self-evident. Pointing this out just makes everything bad for everyone.

name: addison
text: So many emotions without any words I love it!

name: dusty
text: I've noticed that this rule doesn't seem to exist with bodybuilders. It's kinda weird.
